contentList.content: Mistborn are figures shrouded in awe and fear. These rare individuals have the power to burn all metals known to Allomancers, making them masters of a versatile and formidable array of abilities. By ingesting and metabolizing these metals, a Mistborn can enhance their strength, fly across the battlefield, soothe or riot emotions, and even manipulate time around them.
Mistborn drink vials of various metals to fuel their Allomantic abilities. You replenish your Metal Slots on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Mistborn burn metals they ingest to power their Allomatic abilities.
Unlocks the ability to burn iron, enabling the use of Allomancy to pull metallic objects and enemies. Enable the ability to toggle <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="IronAnchor">Iron Anchor</LSTag>.
Unlocks the ability to burn steel, allowing the use of Allomancy to push metallic objects and enemies.
Unlocks the ability to burn pewter, greatly enhancing physical strength, endurance, and resilience.
Unlocks the ability to burn tin, significantly heightening all five senses for improved perception and awareness.
Unlocks the ability to burn zinc, enabling the use of Allomancy to inflame the emotions of others.
Unlocks the ability to burn brass, allowing the use of Allomancy to soothe and dampen the emotions of others.
Unlocks the ability to burn copper, creating a cloud that hides Allomantic pulses and protects against emotional manipulation.
Unlocks the ability to burn bronze, granting the power to detect Allomantic pulses and sense other Allomancers.
Unlocks the ability to burn gold, allowing the use of Allomancy to see potential past versions of oneself.
Unlocks the ability to burn electrum, enabling the use of Allomancy to foresee one's own immediate future.
Unlocks the ability to burn cadmium, creating a bubble that significantly slows down time within its area.
Unlocks the ability to burn bendalloy, generating a bubble that speeds up time within its area.
Unlocks the ability to burn aluminum, instantly depleting all metal reserves and rendering the user powerless.
Unlocks the ability to burn duralumin, dramatically enhancing the strength and potency of all other Allomantic metals for a brief moment.
Unlocks the ability to burn nicrosil, magnifying the Allomantic abilities of others upon contact.
Unlocks the ability to burn chromium, causing other Allomancers to lose all their metal reserves upon contact.
Select the Allomantic metals to incorporate into your build, unlocking unique abilities and enhancing your power as a Mistborn.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Target must be smaller or equal-sized.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Target must be larger or equal-sized.
By burning iron, pull a smaller or equal-sized target closer, dealing damage and disrupting their position.
By burning iron, pull a smaller or equal-sized target [1] closer, dealing damage and disrupting their position.
By burning iron, anchor to nearby metals and increase size category by 1.
By burning iron, pull towards a larger or equal-sized target, closing the distance instantly.
By burning steel, push a smaller or equal-sized target away, dealing damage and disrupting their position.
By burning steel, push a smaller or equal-sized target [1] away, dealing damage and disrupting their position.
By burning steel, push away from a larger or equal-sized target, propelling in the opposite direction.
By burning steel, push away from a larger or equal-sized target, propelling [1] in the opposite direction.
By burning steel, propel a metal coin towards a target, dealing piercing damage.
By burning steel and pushing against metal on the ground, triple your jumping distance.
By burning iron and pulling on metal above you, triple your jumping distance.
